title: Bad Parking and Lame Breakfast
text: We were in San Francisco only for a couple of nights for the Oysterfest. Unfortunately, most of the other hotels in the area we wanted were all booked and we didn't want to pay an arm and a leg, so we stayed here. The parking situation is pretty bad, as noted by others. Spaces are small and there aren't enough for everyone. Breakfast was a joke--a lame little packaged danish and coffee. We ended up at IHOP across the street. The room itself was okay, but it didn't have that "clean" feel to me. It just didn't seem like it had been thoroughly cleaned and I didn't feel like I could walk around barefooted. It was okay, but nothing to write home about.
